title: cellranger_mapping
---

Cell Ranger mapping pipeline.

## Argument help

Run the following command to view the workflow's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script /home/rcannood/workspace/jnj/openpipeline/workflows/ingestion/cellranger_mapping/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name          |Description                                         |Attributes                                  |
|:-------------|:---------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------|
|`--id`        |ID of the sample.                                   |string, required, example: "foo"            |
|`--input`     |A fastq file.                                       |file, required, example: "data.fastq"       |
|`--reference` |Path to a Cell Ranger reference.                    |file, required, example: "reference.tar.gz" |
|`--cores`     |Set max cores the pipeline may request at one time. |integer, example: 2                         |
|`--memory`    |Set max GB the pipeline may request at one time.    |integer, example: 10                        |
:::
